item.title: A pothole in road problem, 9th December
item.description:

item.title: New pothole forming on the approach to the crown of the hill southbound., 9th December
item.description:
New pothole forming on the *approach* to the crown of the hill southbound on the Churchdown-Hucclecote lane, just as you leave Churchdown.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Double pothole on the Longlevens side of Elmbridge Court roundabout (A40/A417), 9th December
item.description:
Double pothole on the Longlevens side of Elmbridge Court roundabout (A40/A417), on the lining between lanes 1 and 2. I'm aware there is further *painting* due in January 2026.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary barriers been in place in ?collapsed wall for 6 months, 9th December
item.description:
End of Denbigh Road- temporary barriers have been in place for at least 6 months for assumed collapsed wall. Not only has this still not been fixed, the barriers are not stable in the recent storms and are frequently falling over and a danger to the public including many small children that use this path to the school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Denbigh Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement is completely blocked by fallen over "Ridgeway" barriers which I think have been left over from previous road closure. Creating hazard for both pedestrians and car drivers., 9th December
item.description:
The whole street is a hazard zone with the pavement completely blocked by fallen over "Ridgeway" barriers which I think have been left over from previous road closure. Creating hazard for both pedestrians and car drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Albert Place, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
